mapper.sql: id, p_uniname, p_title, p_tel, p_start_tel, p_event_id, p_account_id, pet_name, p_check, is_del, create_time, remark_1, remark_2, remark_3, remark_4
p.id, p.p_uniname, p_title, p_tel, p_start_tel, p_event_id, p_account_id, pet_name, p_check, is_del, create_time , tpt.p_text as text
mapper.select:
select
from t_phontom as p inner join t_phontom_text as tpt on p.p_uniname = tpt.p_uniname where is_del = false
and p_check = #{state}
order by p.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_phontom (p_uniname, p_title, p_tel, p_start_tel, p_event_id, p_account_id, pet_name, p_check, is_del, create_time, remark_1, remark_2, remark_3, remark_4) values (#{pUniname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pTel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pStartTel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pEventId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pAccountId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{petName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pCheck,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isDel,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_phontom
p_uniname = #{pUniname,jdbcType=CHAR},
p_title = #{pTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
p_tel = #{pTel,jdbcType=CHAR},
p_start_tel = #{pStartTel,jdbcType=CHAR},
p_event_id = #{pEventId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

remark_4 = #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_phontom set p_uniname = #{pUniname,jdbcType=CHAR}, p_title = #{pTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_tel = #{pTel,jdbcType=CHAR}, p_start_tel = #{pStartTel,jdbcType=CHAR}, p_event_id = #{pEventId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, p_account_id = #{pAccountId,jdbcType=CHAR}, pet_name = #{petName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_check = #{pCheck,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark_1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark_2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark_3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark_4 = #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
